132.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

8.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

94.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

17.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?
